title: What are advantage to be writer in Wikipedia? - Quora

response.answer_text: There is no such personal/Financial benefits of being a Wikipedian. But if you want to have your intellectual growth then Wikipedia is the place for you. Benefits: You expand your own Knowledge while writing articles on Wikipedia.You become a part of one of the biggest open source enthusiasts.A huge amount of Opertunities in the Future.A good status in the society.You learn a lot about Right Protection and unbiased content creation.And most importantly, You spread the knowledge among people.There are many more benefits of becoming a contributor of Wikipedia but its really hard to explain all in a small space. Better if you start contributing and experience it.
